blog.name: giftofdreams
blog.description:
I am here to give you the gift of your dreams by writing anything for you guys, including gif blurbs or preferences.

•REQUESTS ARE OPEN•

*NO SMUT*

question: Can i 12 with chris evans
answer:
12. “But it’s Halloween.” 

A/N: Hello thank you for requesting, I hope you like this. Let me know what you think! Thank you ♡ I hope this fits with what you’re looking for Also, I’m not sure if Chris hates horror movies but let’s pretend for this lol 

Also, send in a request using this Prompt List!! Send in the asks here!!

You could say that Chris and Y/N were perfect for each other. They like the same things, like dogs, reading and movies. However, that was one they were never able to agree on, the genre of which movie they should watch. Since Y/N loved horror movies and Chris didn’t. She liked the adrenaline that ran through her bones and veins which was something that Chris never understood.

His understanding of movies was that they were something to do to relax. They were made to help one forget about the outside world. Not to cause one to become tense while watching the film and then be scared once it’s done. Which is what brought the couple to the moment they were in at the moment. Chris wanted to watch a classical action movie while Y/N felt it was necessary to watch horror movies since it was the holiday to do so.

“Chris, please let’s watch a scary movie. Plus I read some reviews on it and they say it’s not that scary,” Y/N practically begged as Chris crossed his arms in front of his chest. He was not backing down this time, as he clenched the remote

“Y/N, that’s what you said last time and it turned out to be the scariest movie I’ve ever watched.”

“But it’s Halloween, Chris,” Y/N whined. 

Chris’ response that first came to his mind was to say that he didn’t care, but he didn’t. Instead, he sighed deeply and pointed a finger accusingly at Y/N. “Alright, we can watch it but the moment I say we need to take it off, we’re taking it off and watching the movie I want to watch.”

Y/N quickly snatched the remote from Chris’ hand and placed a chaste kiss to the corner of his lips. She quickly played the movie, before he could read the summary or before he could change his mind. Chris didn’t make her take it off during the time they were watching, which was something that he easily regretted once the movie was finished.

He turned to look at Y/N, with wide eyes. “We are never watching a movie of your choice again.” To which they both knew it was a lie.

summary: You have to be really a big neurotic coward, if you feel threatened by a small minority so much that you have to make a big...
caption:
You have to be really a big neurotic coward, if you feel threatened by a small minority so much that you have to make a big statement about it.

If you can’t deal and live in peace with people, who are different from you, you are weak, childish and stupid.

reblog.comment:

If you can’t deal and live in peace with people, who are different from you, you are weak, childish and stupid.
